2+1.sig_info: Marine Corps. The Vietnam War. The Italian Mafia. Frank Castle has conditioned himself for high pain tolerance, granting him a 30 to 85% chance to trigger an Indestructible Passive that lasts 8 seconds when receiving a lethal blow. This can only trigger once per fight.
